00063 void Face::addOwnNormals() {
00064     //Check that there are some vertices to do this on, otherwise there is an error
00065     if (vertexIndex.size() == 0) {
00066         return;
00067     }
00068 
00069     //Set all of the normalIndexes to the same things as the vertexIndex, so that each vertex has its own normal
00070     normalIndex = vertexIndex;
00071 
00072     //Different methods if it is a fan or strip
00073     if (isFan) {
00074         //Put in the new normals for this face here
00075         std::vector<Point3> thisFaceNormals;
00076         thisFaceNormals.resize(normalIndex.size());
00077 
00078         //This is the base of the fan
00079         Point3 root = (*vertices)[vertexIndex[0]];
00080 
00081         //Go through each triangle, calculate the normal, then add it to all of the points of that
00082         for (int i = 1; i < vertexIndex.size() - 1; i++) {
00083             Point3 thisNormal = Point3::cross(((*vertices)[vertexIndex[i + 1]] - root), ((*vertices)[vertexIndex[i]] - root)).getUnit();
00084             thisFaceNormals[0] = thisFaceNormals[0] + thisNormal;
00085             thisFaceNormals[i+1] = thisFaceNormals[i+1] + thisNormal;
00086             thisFaceNormals[i] = thisFaceNormals[i] + thisNormal;
00087         }
00088 
00089         //Now add each of these face normals to the actual stack of normals
00090         for (int i = 0; i < thisFaceNormals.size(); i++) {
00091             //printf("Trying to check %i, normalIndex %i\n", i, normalIndex[i]);
00092             (*normals)[normalIndex[i]] = (*normals)[normalIndex[i]] + thisFaceNormals[i];
00093         }
00094     } else {
00095         //Put in the new normals for this face here
00096         std::vector<Point3> thisFaceNormals;
00097         thisFaceNormals.resize(normalIndex.size());
00098 
00099         //Go through each triangle, calculate the normal, then add it to all of the points of that
00100         for (int i = 0; i < vertexIndex.size() - 2; i++) {
00101             Point3 thisNormal;
00102             //Orientation is different depending on whether i is even or odd
00103             if (i %1 == 0) {
00104                 thisNormal = Point3::cross(((*vertices)[vertexIndex[i + 1]] - (*vertices)[vertexIndex[i]]), ((*vertices)[vertexIndex[i + 2]] - (*vertices)[vertexIndex[i]])).getUnit();
00105             } else {
00106                 thisNormal = Point3::cross(((*vertices)[vertexIndex[i + 2]] - (*vertices)[vertexIndex[i]]), ((*vertices)[vertexIndex[i + 1]] - (*vertices)[vertexIndex[i]])).getUnit();
00107             }
00108             thisFaceNormals[i] = thisFaceNormals[i] + thisNormal;
00109             thisFaceNormals[i+1] = thisFaceNormals[i+1] + thisNormal;
00110             thisFaceNormals[i+2] = thisFaceNormals[i+2] + thisNormal;
00111         }
00112 
00113         //Now add each of these face normals to the actual stack of normals
00114         for (int i = 0; i < thisFaceNormals.size(); i++) {
00115             (*normals)[normalIndex[i]] = (*normals)[normalIndex[i]] + thisFaceNormals[i];
00116         }
00117     }
00118 }
00119 
00120 //Draw the face to the screen
00121 bool Face::drawFace() {
00122     if (isFan) {
00123         glBegin(GL_TRIANGLE_FAN);
00124     } else {
00125         glBegin(GL_TRIANGLE_STRIP);
00126     }
00127     if (normals != NULL && textures != NULL && vertices != NULL) {
00128         for (int i = 0; i < vertexIndex.size(); i++) {
00129             (*normals)[normalIndex[i]].doNormal();
00130             (*textures)[textureIndex[i]].doTex();
00131             (*vertices)[vertexIndex[i]].doVertex();
00132         }
00133     } else if (normals != NULL && vertices != NULL) {
00134         for (int i = 0; i < vertexIndex.size(); i++) {
00135             (*normals)[normalIndex[i]].doNormal();
00136             (*vertices)[vertexIndex[i]].doVertex();
00137         }
00138     } else if (textures != NULL && vertices != NULL) {
00139         for (int i = 0; i < vertexIndex.size(); i++) {
00140             (*textures)[textureIndex[i]].doTex();
00141             (*vertices)[vertexIndex[i]].doVertex();
00142         }
00143     } else if (vertices != NULL) {
00144         for (int i = 0; i < vertexIndex.size(); i++) {
00145             (*vertices)[vertexIndex[i]].doVertex();
00146         }
00147     }
00148     glEnd();
00149     return true;
00150 }
